makswadin da, “pashchath-nuthana-thaththwawadin” da ithihasaya nowalakwiya haki lesa purwa-nuthana-thaththwaye sita nuthana thaththwaya dakwa diga haremin pawathinneya yanna saha nawikaranaya enisama pragathishiliya, yana libaral drushtiya samanga wiwidhakarayen ekanga wethi.

mema kruthin sandaha rajya sahithya sammana pradanaya janadhipathi maithripala sirisena mahatha athin siduwu athara mema awasthawa sandaha abhyanthara katayuthu, wayambaa sanwardhana ha sanskruthika katayuthu amathi es.
samanya amma thaththage daruwan adhyapanayen aathkaramin thikhenawa.
me woharika wiganana warthawa nam hadala thiyenne wiganakawarun kiwwata pasugiya aanduwa pathkala mulya mandalaya wisin.
oba pawasana jehowa(hari nama yehowa) kiyanneth katholika aagame dewiyan wahasegema namaya ya.(githawaliya 83:17,nikmayama 3:15)

sewaka bandawa ganim wadi kirima menma sewayin sandaha nisi subasadhana saha sadharana watup gewime pakejayak sapayime wadagathkama ganada rajya amathya wasantha senanayaka mahatha mehidi danumwath kara atha.
mayawarunta diyunu tharaka widya danumak thibuni.
dan me gem ekata sellam karanawa.
adata yedi athi eksath jathinge dinaya wenuwen paniwidayak nikuth karamin ehi mahalekam bankimun me bawa pawasa sitiyeya.
api aparadha saha nithi wirodhi kriya pilibada parikshana karanawa.
sawul kodiya ruhuna niyojanaya karana athara mema kodiya dutugamunu rajuda bhawitha kale ya.

rakawa, buddhi wikrama, thalatha gunasekara, miyuri samarasinha, dinesh priyasad, mahendra perera, shantha saparamadu, radha da mel, mangala karunarathna, lintan semage, tedi widyalankara, lal kularathna, edwad gunawardhana, luwalin wandarwol, raj perera, samanali fonseka, senewirathna punchihewa, aananda basnayaka, nimala athapaththu, gamini jayalath, samudra hikkaduwa liyanage, kirthi shri piris, prasad wirathunga, hirantha mahathanthila, lushani mellawa, sujatha paramanadan, chaya perera, harald alwis, wini weththasinha, wasantha wittachchi, el. ech. premadasa idiripath kirima - ee. ji. en. chithrapata nishpadanaya - anoja wirasinha, kapithan gamini nanayakkara thira natakaya saha adhyakshanaya - jaksan anthani sahaya adhyakshanaya - nilendra deshapriya, sharli asantha da alwis kamara adhyakshanaya - andaෲ jayamanna kamara eekakaya - sunil jayawira, en.

ee mahathage dehaya thanpath kara athi kolambaa paudgalika mal shalawa wetha ada (11) dahawal giya janadhipathithuma dehayata awasan gaurawa dakwu athara, ee mahathage birinda, daruwan athulu pawule gnyathin wetha menma rasika rasikawiyan wetha da siya sathishaya sanwegaya pala kale ya.
nawa pathwim magin mahajanaya illa siti deya itu wi adda?
ee wage ma athigaru janadhipathithuma ge chamal rajapaksha mathithuma ge guru harukam nisayi mata me gamana enna labune.
